Title: Optimizing Note Content and Structure for Xiaohongshu
Content: Optimizing the content and structure of your Xiaohongshu notes is essential for maximizing engagement and conversions. Start by focusing on the cover image, as it accounts for 80% of the note's effectiveness. The cover should be visually appealing and relevant to the product.
